humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, the right sentinel lymph node biopsy did not show any evidence of carcinoma (`No evidence of carcinoma in one lymph node`). Additionally, the total number of lymph nodes examined was 1, and there was no regional lymph node metastasis identified histologically (`pNO: No regional lymph node metastasis identified histologically`). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Right Sentinel Lymph Node, Biopsy: - No evidence of carcinoma in one lymph node.' This indicates that the sentinel lymph node does not contain cancer, which corresponds to N0 in the TNM staging system.
